{% if False %}
{% if False %} sees has been renamed to veux {% endif %}
{% endif %}

Fast
veux is implemented in lightweight Python and leverages state of the art rendering technologies like glTF to match like the performance metal APIs like VTK and OpenGL, but without the headache of FFIs.

Exact
veux offers support for geometrically exact simulations, and correctly handles finite rotations.

Safe
veux is stateless and modular, letting you plug it into existing workflows without conflict or side effects.

Gallery

{% for example in examples %}
{{ example.title }}
{{ example.description }}
 {% endfor %}

Ecosystem

veux is a part of the larger STAIRLab ecosystem. STAIRLab is a research group at the University of California, Berkeley, that focuses on the development of computational tools for the analysis and design of structures and infrastructure systems.

mdof

Fast and friendly system identification.

sees

Fast and stateless bindings to the OpenSees Framework for finite element analysis.

irie

An infrastructure resilience engine powering the https://structures.live platform for structural health monitoring.
